website_summaries.verdict: The set for kids who want to shoot a long distance and have the ability to fire quickly.
pros: Easy to load and fire straight
Can be used by either right- or left-handed children
Easy enough for a young child to handle, but still fun for older children
Arrows can fly up to 85 feet
cons: Not terribly accurate for target practice
2 arrows likely won't be enough, particularly when the arrows are shooting so far

customer_reviews.title: Best Nerf Rebelle bow around
customer_reviews.text: Best Nerf Rebelle bow around. Very easy to use and quick to reload. If you need to replace the string, these work great:
customer_reviews.author: Ice cream samarai salami

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price but doesn't shoot great
customer_reviews.text: Difficult for little arms to stay steady and shoot well. It looks great, so it has the novelty effect and wow factor, but she never really shoots it a month later. It was just too difficult. She'd have better accuracy tossing the arrows.
customer_reviews.author: Titus

customer_reviews.title: Is a hit
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my little 8 yo girl for Christmas and she played with it throughout the whole Christmas break. To me that's a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Day

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to a Katniss Everdeen costume!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this for my 7-year-old niece's birthday. She planned on going as Katniss Everdeen from The Hunger Games for Halloween so this was the perfect gift and addition to her costume. She absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: BlueBirds

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! So well made !
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter got this for her 7th birthday & was thrilled she could hit her dad at 30 yards : ) LOL!
customer_reviews.author: linda walters

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Good for little girls but obviously it's not very accurate. Good for fun.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: Got 3 of them for Christmas gift for grandkids but mom & dad join in the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: It is not bad. it is little bit award to use it though. My son already broke two of the arrow on the second day. He is left-handed.
customer_reviews.author: Jieun B.

customer_reviews.title: It’s fun, but not intended for target practicing.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not very accurate at all. But my girl’s having fun with it. Don’t get it if you have specific targets in mind for a party... which we did. They got pretty frustrated because they couldn’t hit anything with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this gift! She plays with it all the time and it’s definitely worth the cost. Arrows are sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great nerf bow
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a costume. It fires fine and is quite fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it!!! She has lots of fun playing with this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Decimate

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Came on time looks exactly like the pictures can’t wait to give it to my kid for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Aisaacs

customer_reviews.title: A ton of fun
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing how accurate my kids are with these. Great job hasboro!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very fun for 6 year old and up.
customer_reviews.author: Dive2277

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: If my daughter is any indiction she LOVES this. She collects nerf and went nuts over this.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Paal

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 10-year old for Christmas. I was a little worried because she is very small for her age but it pulls back easily and has a great range. She really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis Shelby

customer_reviews.title: It really great if you need a left
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed that nerf made a left handed bow. It really great if you need a left. If you are right eye (hand) dominate: the grip isn't right and the arrows load from the wrong side, and this bow would not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can be dangerous if misused
customer_reviews.text: Be careful these actual fire with significant force and can hurt a child. Just because it's a nerf doesn't mean it doesn't hurt anyone. It is what I was expecting from the toy but was not expecting that much force from a nerf toy.
customer_reviews.author: john richards

customer_reviews.title: It really works but needs more arrows
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty good works good wish they bundled it with more arrows you only get 2 arrows but that should be enough.Bought it for my niece and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! My daughter loves it too lol she shoots all the neighbor boys with it and believe me those arrows fly pretty far! She finally gets some revenge!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: hurt like the dickens
customer_reviews.text: Niece loves it...only downside is, nerf or not those arrows apparently, ".... hurt like the dickens!"
customer_reviews.author: smglaze

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I love it and love playing with it. Will buy more arrows
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Nerf bow and arrow
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter, basically so she could shoot her mom amd dad. Pretty sure she is winning
customer_reviews.author: Ack

customer_reviews.title: Even More Fun When Paired With Velcro and Target
customer_reviews.text: These bows are fun on their own, but even more fun when paired with some kind of target. We bought two of these bows along with some velcro stickers and the Nerf Tailgate Target We also bought a Nerf Mega blaster for the younger kids. We affixed the velcro stickers to the tips of the arrows and the darts. Sometimes the arrows wouldn't stick, but they usually did. It was a fun game for all ages! I wish they made a bow that was the same size, but was more generic so it didn't seem like it was girl-themed. My 12 and 14 year old brothers had fun with the bows too.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

product_meta.title: Nerf Rebelle Tribute Bow
product_meta.description: Launch into adventure with Nerf Rebelle blasters and bows! Keep the game moving fast with the easy-load, easy-fire Nerf Rebelle Tribute Bow. It’s quick and easy arrow-firing action; nock the arrow, then pull the string back and release it to send the soft-tipped arrow flying through the air up to 85 feet (25 meters). And as the arrow flies, it makes a whistling sound! Store arrows on the bow for quick reloading. The Nerf Rebelle Tribute Bow comes with 2 arrows. Nerf and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Comes with 2 arrows that whistle when launched
